column5: Enchanting retreat on the San Marcos River in Martindale, TX. It is haven for rest and rejuvenation and graced with majestic trees, native, wildlife friendly gardens, stunning views of the San Marcos River, a peaceful Courtyard, and a variety of calming meditation spaces. GraceGardens has several guest rentals on the one acre property: Rustic Oak Cabin, Rustic Studio, Cypress Room (in Main House), The Bunk Room (in Main House).
